title: Big Hurricane Has You Fooled! GOP Crip Claims Working? 10.03.22
itunes:title: Big Hurricane Has You Fooled! GOP Crip Claims Working? 10.03.22
description:
In episode 1343, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, writer, and co-host of Pod Is A Woman, Eli Olsberg, to discuss… HURRICANE HUSTLE BOSS HAS A LONG HISTORY OF BEING SHITTY, Tucker Carlson Blows The Lid Off Of Big Hurricane, Sorry To Bring This Up Again--But Newt Gingrich is OBSESSED with Fetterman and more!

  1. HURRICANE HUSTLE BOSS HAS A LONG HISTORY OF BEING SHITTY
  2. Tucker Carlson Blows The Lid Off Of Big Hurricane
  3. No, all weather is not ‘artificially controlled’
  4. Do Jewish bankers control the weather? A short history of this dumb but ugly conspiracy theory
  5. Trump Kept Asking if China Was Shooting Us With a ‘Hurricane Gun’
  6. ‘Hurricane truthers’: Bonkers conspiracies are putting lives in danger

LISTEN: Móntame En La Tormenta by La Mecánica Popular

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
